body:
@yaroslavvb2 is that 100% sure. Because we observe on smaller Feed Forward models Tensorflow to be able to measure about a half memory usage than theano and torch, but on larger models it uses the same. 
Additionally, we run everything with the flag `allow_growth`, so there is no reason why tensorflow should allocate x2 more memory than needed?
